744330.name: Gear Stalker
744330.description:
This is a VR only game.

Scavenge for loot in a post apocalyptic world full of crumbling ruins and deadly kill bots left over from a long forgotten war.
Scout out patrol patterns and potential ambush points to set up your traps.
Take on larger foes for greater rewards but make sure you are well prepared if you want to stand a chance.


Features:
Single-player campaign
Roguelite elements
Craft tools and weapons from mech parts
Observe and research mechs to find weaknesses and strategies to take them on
Destructible buildings
Multiple hazards and enemy types
Destructible modular mech designs with multiple attack patternsance.
Standing and seated supported
Multiple locomotion options

Trailer Music: https://www.bensound.com
